actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to transfer the administration of the Food Stamp Program to the Secretary of Health and Human Services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Food Stamp Program Transfer Act of 1980
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Food Stamp Program Transfer Act of 1980 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to transfer the administration of the food stamp program from the Secretary of Agriculture to the Secretary of Health and Human Services. Makes necessary conforming changes in such Act.

titles.title: Food Stamp Program Transfer Act of 1980
A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to transfer the administration of the Food Stamp Program to the Secretary of Health and Human Services, and for other purposes.
